definition: to lift/to raise/to raise one's head/high/high spirits/soaring/expensive

sentences.english: They all wore the most expensive clothes and had beautiful, long, curly hair.
sentences.chinese: 她們都穿着最昂貴的衣服，留着長長的美麗的鬈髮。

sentences.english: Although it is not expensive, we never seem to have quite enough money.
sentences.chinese: 雖然這是不昂貴的，我們從來沒有，似乎已很夠了錢。

sentences.english: Building a concrete Koi pond is a very expensive thing to do.
sentences.chinese: 建設一個具體的錦鯉池是一個非常昂貴的事情。

sentences.english: Sydney has become the most expensive Australian city for expatriates.
sentences.chinese: 悉尼已成爲最昂貴的澳大利亞移民城市。

sentences.english: ONE highly-skilled legal professional and one man in a very expensive suit.
sentences.chinese: 一個高級法律顧問和一個穿着非常昂貴的西裝的男人。

sentences.english: Optical Localizer have the very high accuracy and reliability, but very expensive.
sentences.chinese: 光學立體定位儀精度高，可靠性強，但是價格昂貴。

sentences.english: Tao Okamoto’s 'rice bowl' hair may be the most valuable cut in the world.
sentences.chinese: 岡本多緒的碗狀頭或許是世界上最昂貴的髮型了。

sentences.english: Or was it something in the expensive bottled water in Beverly Hills where Oscar organizers are based.
sentences.chinese: 也許是因爲貝弗利山昂貴的瓶裝水中有些莫名物質。

sentences.english: The development of new, alternative insecticides is an expensive and long-term endeavour.
sentences.chinese: 新的替代殺蟲劑的研發是一項昂貴的長期努力。

sentences.english: How many common people could afford such expensive fees?
sentences.chinese: 有多少平民百姓能夠支付得起這樣昂貴的“面聖”費？

sentences.english: Here is a little background on why I splurged and bought such an expensive running tool.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有些我爲什麼要買這個如此昂貴的跑步手錶。

sentences.english: “It’s very expensive to buy it this way, one day at a time,” she says.
sentences.chinese: “這樣買水是很昂貴的，每天一次，”她說。

sentences.english: Of all kinds of shawls, Shahtoosh is the most expensive with light and soft quality.
sentences.chinese: 很輕很軟的沙圖什，是披肩中最昂貴的。

sentences.english: It turns out that the anti-job-loss policies make workers expensive to employ.
sentences.chinese: 結局是，防止崗位流失政策使僱傭工人變得昂貴。

sentences.english: A hydroponic garden is more expensive than dirt.
sentences.chinese: 水培花園比實土培養要昂貴得多。

sentences.english: Sea weed extract is neither a rare nor expensive ingredient.
sentences.chinese: 海藻萃取液是一種既非稀有也不昂貴的成分。

definition: saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on
many and complicated/mired in minor details
